page.title: 20Mark People's Attitudes
page.content: Mark is generally liked very much because it is a friendly place and has a variety of clubs and activities. Many would not like to see any changes at all. Some wanted a few more shops -say a butchers or chemists. Some wanted a car park, a swimming pool,mains drainage and gas (some do not have that in outlying areas).Older people like things to be as they have always been. Listening to the Church bells is one of their favourite things.Mark people's general feelings about Mark are summed up like this:"I come down from Somerset but that don't really matter. I can't read,I can't write but I can drive a tractor"! ______________________________________ {Text collected and written by the 1st {and 2nd Years of Hugh Sexey Middle {School with the help of the Staff and {Members of the local community of Mark
